meanings.definition: Begin or introduce (something, especially a new system or policy)
meanings.sent1: The principal inaugurates the new school rules during assembly.
meanings.sent2: The President inaugurates a new healthcare program for citizens.
meanings.sent3: The cat inaugurates a 'no dogs allowed' policy in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The rising sun inaugurates a day full of possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The chef inaugurates the cooking competition with a sizzling dish.

meanings.definition: Mark the beginning of (an event or activity)
meanings.sent1: The ringing bell inaugurates the start of the race.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks display inaugurates the annual festival.
meanings.sent3: The clown inaugurates the party with a silly dance.
meanings.sent4: The first snowfall inaugurates the winter season.
meanings.sent5: The referee's whistle inaugurates the soccer match.
